SOULSTEAL.DESCRIPTION: The first time attacking you in a turn, grants you a buff for each stack. NL Human: 2 #yLight. NL Kitsune: 2 #yWill-o-Wisps (static). NL Fox: 2 #yDark.

WILL-O-WISP.DESCRIPTION: Consumes itself at the end of your turn to deal damage equal to the number of wisps.

SHAPE.DESCRIPTION: Aspect effects of that #yShape will trigger. Some relics and powers make your #yShape grant persistent buffs too.

ASPECT.DESCRIPTION: Aspect effects only trigger when you are in the listed Shape.

LIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Persistent buff. Converted to Block at the start of your turn when over 9 stacks.

DARK.DESCRIPTION: Persistent buff. Converted into damaging a random enemy at the start of your turn when over 9 stacks

SHADE.DESCRIPTION: Negates up to that many instances of unblocked damage until next turn and heals you a small amount instead.

Elder.DESCRIPTION: Special cards that can't be smithed but automatically upgrade through 9 tiers based on performing actions.

Charm.DESCRIPTION: Will repeat its last chosen action in a manner beneficial to you.

Quickshape.DESCRIPTION: Uncollectable zero-cost cards with Ethereal and Exhaust that change your shape.

Echo.DESCRIPTION: Echoes are copies of cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.
